ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Manage storage in Microsoft's 'Azure' cloud: <https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/product-categories/storage/>. On the admin side, 'AzureStor' includes features to create, modify and delete storage accounts. On the client side, it includes an interface to blob storage, file storage, and 'Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2': upload and download files and blobs; list containers and files/blobs; create containers; and so on. Authenticated access to storage is supported, via either a shared access key or a shared access signature (SAS). Part of the 'AzureR' family of packages.

Manage storage in Microsoft's 'Azure' cloud: <https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/product-categories/storage/>. On the admin side, 'AzureStor' includes features to create, modify and delete storage accounts. On the client side, it includes an interface to blob storage, file storage, and 'Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2': upload and download files and blobs; list containers and files/blobs; create containers; and so on. Authenticated access to storage is supported, via either a shared access key or a shared access signature (SAS). Part of the 'AzureR' family of packages.

name: r-azurestor
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "3.7.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-azurestor
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/AzureStor_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/AzureStor/AzureStor_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d340c01b90ba901d3a9a29d32dd808a645a6ece21f04e868696aea7c31c045f8

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-azurermr >=2.3.0
    - r-r6
    - r-httr >=1.4.0
    - r-mime
    - r-openssl
    - r-vctrs
    - r-xml2
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-azurermr >=2.3.0
    - r-r6
    - r-httr >=1.4.0
    - r-mime
    - r-openssl
    - r-vctrs
    - r-xml2

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('AzureStor')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('AzureStor')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/Azure/AzureStor https://github.com/Azure/AzureR
  license: MIT
  summary: 'Manage storage in Microsoft''s ''Azure'' cloud: <https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/product-categories/storage/>. On the admin side, ''AzureStor'' includes features to create, modify and delete storage accounts. On the client side, it includes an interface to blob storage, file storage, and ''Azure Data Lake Storage
    Gen2'': upload and download files and blobs; list containers and files/blobs; create containers; and so on. Authenticated access to storage is supported, via either a shared access key or a shared access signature (SAS). Part of the ''AzureR'' family of packages.'
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: AzureStor
# Title: Storage Management in 'Azure'
# Version: 3.7.0
# Authors@R: c( person("Hong", "Ooi", , "hongooi73@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre")), person("Microsoft", role="cph") )
# Description: Manage storage in Microsoft's 'Azure' cloud: <https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/product-categories/storage/>. On the admin side, 'AzureStor' includes features to create, modify and delete storage accounts. On the client side, it includes an interface to blob storage, file storage, and 'Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2': upload and download files and blobs; list containers and files/blobs; create containers; and so on. Authenticated access to storage is supported, via either a shared access key or a shared access signature (SAS). Part of the 'AzureR' family of packages.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# URL: https://github.com/Azure/AzureStor https://github.com/Azure/AzureR
# BugReports: https://github.com/Azure/AzureStor/issues
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Depends: R (>= 3.3),
# Imports: utils, R6, httr (>= 1.4.0), mime, openssl, xml2, vctrs, AzureRMR (>= 2.3.0)
# Suggests: AzureAuth, readr, knitr, rmarkdown, jsonlite, testthat, processx, uuid
# RoxygenNote: 7.1.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2022-05-24 23:57:27 UTC; hongo
# Author: Hong Ooi [aut, cre], Microsoft [cph]
# Maintainer: Hong Ooi <hongooi73@gmail.com>
